name: Your Agent name
lore: Some lore of your AI Agent 1
Some lore of your AI Agent 1
objectives: first objective that your AI Agent need to follow
second objective that your AI Agent need to follow
knowledge: first knowledge of your AI Agent
second knowledge of your AI Agent
interval: Your agent interval beetween each transaction of the Agent in ms,
chatId: Your Agent Chat-id for isolating memory
maxIterations: The number of iterations your agent will execute before stopping
mode: The mode of your agent, can be interactive, autonomous or hybrid

memory.enabled: true or false to enable or disable memory
memory.shortTermMemorySize: The number of messages your agent will remember

documents.enabled: true or false to enable or disable document context
